text.content:
sequenceDiagram
    participant P as ðŸ‘¤ Payer
    participant M as ðŸ›ï¸ Merchant
    participant PG as ðŸ”— Gateway
    participant ACQ as ðŸ¦ Acquirer
    participant CN as ðŸŒ Network
    participant ISS as ðŸ’³ Issuer
    participant LOG as ðŸ“œ Logger
    participant NOTI as ðŸ“¢ Notification

    P->>M: Initiates payment
    M->>PG: Submit authorization request
    PG->>ACQ: Forward request
    ACQ->>CN: Route to Card Network
    CN->>ISS: Forward to Issuer

    ISS->>ISS: Check balance â†’ Insufficient
    ISS-->>CN: Declined (Insufficient Funds)
    CN-->>ACQ: Forward decline
    ACQ-->>PG: Forward decline
    PG-->>M: Forward decline
    M-->>P: Show declined message

    ISS->>LOG: Log insufficient funds
    LOG->>NOTI: Notify Payer
    NOTI-->>P: Declined due to insufficient balance
